00172     scr3_rbutton2.deinit();

00174     scr3_slider2.deinit();

00179     scr3_bounded_slider2.deinit();

00183     scr4_rbutton3.deinit();
00184     scr4_slider1.deinit();
00185     scr4_slider3.deinit();
00186     scr4_slider4.deinit();

00188     //          for(int i=0;i<department_res.department_count;i++)
00189     //          {
00190     //                  tmp_department_pool_flag[i]=(i<MIN_DEPARTMENT)?1:0;

00199 static void save_express_report(int refreshFlag) {
00200     int vtab1=TMENU_Y1+15,vtab2=TMENU_Y1+28,vtab3=TMENU_Y1+230,vtab4=TMENU_Y1+265;
00201     int tab1=TMENU_X1+40,tab2=TMENU_X1+90,tab3=TMENU_X1+600,tab4=TMENU_X1+650;
00202     if(refreshFlag==INFO_REPAINT) {
00203         user_interface.darken(ZOOM_X1,ZOOM_Y1,ZOOM_X2,ZOOM_Y2);
00204         info.disp_column_bitmap(&vga_back);
00205         user_interface.brighten(tab1,vtab1,tab4,vtab4);
00206         user_interface.rect(tab1,vtab1,tab4,vtab4);
00207         scr5_button_save.create_text
00208             (tab2+70,vtab3,tab2+170,vtab3+20,"Save");
00209         //              scr5_button_save.set_key('S');
00210         scr5_button_cancel.create_text
00211             (tab2+370,vtab3,tab2+470,vtab3+20,"Cancel");
00212         //              scr5_button_cancel.set_key('C');
00213 
00214         font_chartsm.put(tab1+50,vtab2,"Express game name");
00215 
00216         user_interface.bar(tab1+205,vtab2-4,tab1+600,vtab2+18,V_WHITE);
00217         user_interface.rect(tab1+205,vtab2-4,tab1+600,vtab2+18,2);
00218         scr5_game_name.init(tab1+215,vtab2,tab1+600,player_school.school_name,sizeof(player_school.school_name)-1,&font_chartsm,0,1);
00219         sys.redraw_all_flag=0;
00220     }
00221     user_interface.bar(tab1+205,vtab2-4,tab1+600,vtab2+18,V_WHITE);
00222     user_interface.rect(tab1+205,vtab2-4,tab1+600,vtab2+18);
00223     scr5_game_name.paint();
00224 
00225     scr5_button_save.paint();
00226     scr5_button_cancel.paint();
00227 }
00228 
00229 static int save_express_detect() {
00230     vga.use_back();
00231     scr5_game_name.detect();
00232 
00233     vga.use_front();                                // ## use_front to make the button flashing in release mode.
00234     if(scr5_button_save.detect()) {
00235         return 1;
00236     }
00237     if(scr5_button_cancel.detect()) {
00238         current_report_mode=TAB_SCREEN;
00239         sys.redraw_all_flag=1;
00240         return 1;
00241     }
00242     vga.use_back();
00243     return 0;
00244 }

00513 
00514 static int callback_detect(int selNum) {
00515     //--- if no game is selected currently ---//
00516 
00517     if(selNum==0) {
00518         scr1_vbrowser1.detect();
00519         scr1_vbrowser2.detect();
00520         vga.use_front();
00521 
00522         scr1_button_load.detect();
00523 
00524         if(scr1_button_save.detect()) {
00525             current_report_mode=SAVE_EXPRESS;
00526             sys.redraw_all_flag=1;
00527         }
00528 
00529         scr1_button_del.detect();
00530 
00531         vga.use_back();
00532     }
00533 
00534     //----- if a game is selected now ----//
00535 
00536     if(selNum==1) {
00537         int tab1=TMENU_X1+15,vtab1=TMENU_Y1+15;
00538         vga.use_back();
00539 
00540         if(button_left.detect()) {
00541             do {
00542                 player_school.mascot--;
00543                 if(player_school.mascot<1)
00544                     player_school.mascot=image_mascot.rec_count;
00545             } while( player_school.is_hidden_mascot(player_school.mascot) );
00546             vga_back.rest_area(button_refresh_bitmap,0,0);
00547             image_interface.put_front(tab1,vtab1+70,"L-ARW-DN");
00548         }
00549 
00550         if(button_right.detect()) {
00551             do {
00552                 player_school.mascot++;
00553                 if(player_school.mascot>image_mascot.rec_count)
00554                     player_school.mascot=1;
00555             } while( player_school.is_hidden_mascot(player_school.mascot) );
00556             vga_back.rest_area(button_refresh_bitmap,0,0);
00557             image_interface.put_front(tab1+35,vtab1+70,"R-ARW-DN");
00558         }
00559 
00560         scr2_name.detect();
00561 
00562         vga.use_front();                              // ## use_front to make the button flashing in release mode.
00563 
00564         if(button_add.detect()) {
00565             if(scr2_vbrowser2.recno()>0) {
00566                 for(int i=0;i<DEPARTMENT_TYPE_COUNT;i++)
00567                     if(player_school.selected_department_list[i]==0) {
00568                         just_add=left_bws_pool[scr2_vbrowser2.recno()-1];
00569                         player_school.selected_department_list[i]=just_add;
00570                         tmp_department_pool_flag[just_add-1]=1;
00571                         break;
00572                     }
00573                 redraw_browser_flag=1;
00574             }
00575         }
00576 
00577         if(button_remove.detect()) {
00578 
00579             if(scr2_vbrowser1.recno()>0) {
00580                 int i;
00581                 for(i=0;i<DEPARTMENT_TYPE_COUNT;i++)
00582                     if(player_school.selected_department_list[i]==right_bws_pool[scr2_vbrowser1.recno()-1]) {
00583                         just_remove=right_bws_pool[scr2_vbrowser1.recno()-1];
00584                         player_school.selected_department_list[i]=0;
00585                         tmp_department_pool_flag[just_remove-1]=0;
00586                         break;
00587                     }
00588                 // Move the last nonzero entry to fill removed entry.
00589                 for(int j=DEPARTMENT_TYPE_COUNT-1;j>i;j--) {
00590                     if(player_school.selected_department_list[j]!=0) {
00591                         player_school.selected_department_list[i]=
00592                             player_school.selected_department_list[j];
00593                         player_school.selected_department_list[j]=0;
00594                         break;
00595                     }
00596                 }
00597                 //                              sys.redraw_all_flag=1;
00598                 redraw_browser_flag=1;
00599             }
00600         }
00601 
00602         if(button_reset.detect()) {
00603             for(int i=0;i<department_res.department_count;i++) {
00604                 tmp_department_pool_flag[i]=(i<MIN_DEPARTMENT)?1:0;
00605                 redraw_browser_flag=1;
00606             }
00607 
00608             for(i=0;i<DEPARTMENT_TYPE_COUNT;i++)
00609                 player_school.selected_department_list[i]=(i<MIN_DEPARTMENT)?(i+1):0;
00610 
00611             scr2_browseRecCount1=1;
00612             scr2_browseRecCount2=1;
00613         }
00614 
00615         vga.use_back();
00616         if(scr2_vbrowser1.detect()) {
00617         };
00618         if(scr2_vbrowser2.detect()) {
00619         };
00620     }
00621 
00622     if(selNum==2) {
00623         scr3_rbutton1.detect();
00624         scr3_rbutton2.detect();
00625         //              scr3_bounded_slider0.detect();
00626         if(scr3_bounded_slider0.detect())
00627             player_school.prestige=player_school_prestige/1000;
00628         scr3_slider2.detect();
00629         scr3_slider3.detect();
00630         scr3_slider4.detect();
00631         scr3_slider5.detect();
00632         scr3_bounded_slider1.detect();
00633         scr3_bounded_slider2.detect();
00634     }
00635 
00636     if(selNum==3) {
00637         scr4_rbutton1.detect();
00638         scr4_rbutton2.detect();
00639         scr4_rbutton3.detect();
00640         scr4_slider1.detect();
00641 
00642         if(scr4_slider3.detect())
00643             player_school.doctoral_program_intensity=player_school_doctoral_program_intensity/1000;
00644 
00645         if(scr4_slider4.detect())
00646             player_school.sponsored_research_intensity=player_school_sponsored_research_intensity/1000;
00647     }
00648     return 0;
00649 }

00652     deinit();
00653 }

00661 static void scr2_disp_rep_row1(int recNo, int x, int y, int refreshFlag) {
00662     user_interface.bar(x, y, x+240, y+16,Vga::active_buf->color_down);
00663     for(int i=0,j=0;(i<recNo)&&(j<DEPARTMENT_TYPE_COUNT);j++)
00664         if(tmp_department_pool_flag[j]==1)
00665             i++;
00666     //  err.run("department_res.department_count=%d\n",department_res.department_count);
00667     if(j<=department_res.department_count)
00668         font_chartsm.put(x,y,department_res[j]->name);
00669 }
00670 
00671 static void scr2_disp_rep_row2(int recNo, int x, int y, int refreshFlag) {
00672     user_interface.bar(x, y, x+240, y+16,Vga::active_buf->color_down);
00673     for(int i=0,j=0;(i<recNo)&&(j<DEPARTMENT_TYPE_COUNT);j++)
00674         if(tmp_department_pool_flag[j]==0)
00675             i++;
00676     //  DEBUG_LOG("j=");
00677     //  DEBUG_LOG(j);
00678     //  DEBUG_LOG("\n");
00679     if(j<=department_res.department_count)
00680         font_chartsm.put(x,y,department_res[j]->name);
00681 }

00741 //------- End of function Game::scenario_report ------//
00742 
00743 //------- End of function Game::scenario_report ------//
00744 //
00745 void Game::scenario_report(int refreshFlag) {
00746     int vtab1=50,vtab2=150,vtab3=160,vtab4=250;
00747     int tab1=10,tab2=200,tab3=400,tab4=680;
00748 
00749     vga.use_back();
00750 
00751     if(current_report_mode==TAB_SCREEN) {
00752         if (refreshFlag == INFO_REPAINT) {
00753             user_interface.bg_img(pic_id, &vga_back);
00754             tab_menu.init(REPORT_X1,REPORT_Y1,REPORT_X2,REPORT_Y2,
00755                           4, &tab_sel, 150, 150,
00756                           tab_short_desc, tab_long_desc,
00757                           callback_disp, callback_detect);
00758             if (!init_flag) {
00759                 button_start.create_text
00760                     (REPORT_X1+150, REPORT_Y2+15,
00761                      REPORT_X1+300, REPORT_Y2+35, button_label[0]);
00762                 button_cancel.create_text
00763                     (REPORT_X1+400, REPORT_Y2+15,
00764                      REPORT_X1+550, REPORT_Y2+35, button_label[1]);
00765                 init_flag = 1;
00766             }
00767             else {
00768 
00769             }
00770             //                  if (++pic_id == 6) pic_id = 1;
00771             sys.redraw_all_flag=0;
00772         }
00773         else {
00774             tab_menu.refresh(refreshFlag);
00775         }
00776 
00777         button_start.paint();
00778         button_cancel.paint();
00779     }
00780 
00781     if(current_report_mode==SAVE_EXPRESS) {
00782         save_express_report(refreshFlag);
00783     }
00784     vga.blt_buf(0,0,VGA_WIDTH-1,VGA_HEIGHT-1);
00785 }

00789 //------ Begin of function GameSetting::detect ------//
00795 int Game::scenario_detect() {
00796     int rc=0;
00797     vga.use_back();
00798     if(current_report_mode==SAVE_EXPRESS) {
00799         save_express_detect();
00800     }
00801     if(current_report_mode==TAB_SCREEN) {
00802         tab_menu.detect();
00803         vga.use_front();
00804 
00805         if( button_start.detect() ) {
00806             if(right_bws_pool_size>MAX_DEPARTMENT) {
00807                 String msg_text;
00808                 msg_text = "The University must have \nat least ";
00809                 msg_text += m.format(MAX_DEPARTMENT,4);
00810                 msg_text += " but not more \nthan ";
00811                 msg_text += m.format(MIN_DEPARTMENT,4);
00812                 msg_text += " departments.";
00813                 box.msg(msg_text.str_buf);
00814             }
00815             else
00816                 rc = 1;
00817         }
00818         if( button_cancel.detect() )
00819             rc = -1;
00820     }
00821     vga.use_back();
00822 
00823     return rc;
00824 }
